column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Expecting my pizza to be filled with extra layers of sauce
column2: I was a bit disappointed to bite into my first slice and found out it's just all bread & cheese with little sauce... If you're a cheese lover
column3: this place is the place for you. If you're a sauce person like me
column4: the pizza will be overwhelmingly cheesy. It fills you up or you get sick of it after once slice.
